com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.annotations

Annotation Type Daemon


  • @Preamble(description="Specifies that the annotated method has a role in starting/stopping a daemon task")
 @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Daemon

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean shutdown
      Specifies whether the method should be used to shutdown the daemon service
      boolean start
      Specifies whether the method should be used to start the daemon
      boolean stop
      Specifies whether the method should be used to stop the daemon
      java.lang.String task
      Daemon Task name or description

    • Element Detail

      • task

        public abstract java.lang.String task
        Daemon Task name or description
        Returns:
        task name of the daemon
        Default:
        "N/A"

      • start

        public abstract boolean start
        Specifies whether the method should be used to start the daemon
        Returns:
        whether the method should be used to start the daemon
        Default:
        false

      • stop

        public abstract boolean stop
        Specifies whether the method should be used to stop the daemon
        Returns:
        whether the method should be used to stop the daemon
        Default:
        false

      • shutdown

        public abstract boolean shutdown
        Specifies whether the method should be used to shutdown the daemon service
        Returns:
        whether the method should be used to shutdown the daemon service
        Default:
        false
